sentence.Network_en: Final preparations are under way for celebrations to mark German unification.
sentence.Network_cn: 纪念德国统一的庆典活动正在做最后的准备工作。

entry.def: Unification is the process by which two or more countries join together and become one country.

means.word_mean: 1. an occurrence that involves the production of a union
2. the state of being joined or united or linked;
3. the act of making or becoming a single unit;

sentences.sentence: "he looked forward to the unification of his family for the holidays"

stems_affixes.word_buile: uni单一,单个+ped脚→adj.单足的,独腿的
unique独一无二+ly表副词→adv.独特地,唯一地,珍奇地
uni单一,单个+son声音→一个声音→和谐
unify[v.使联合,统一;使相同,使一致]+ication表名词→unification统一,单一化
uni单一,单个+on表名词→n.联合, 合并
uni单一,单个+t→n.个体,[计量]单位
uni单一,单个+ty表名词→n.团结;统一,一致,整体
unit个体+e→v.联合,团结;统一,合并 v.使联合

sentences.en: We are determined to accomplish the great cause of unification of the motherland.
sentences.cn: 我们一定要完成统一祖国的伟大事业。
